contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 14, 1912 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class A)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class A) 500 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmen-s-festival-class-a
None
Maritana [arr. Smith]
Peniel Farm, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK Contest was Maritana set test, plus Own Choice Hymn or March.
Prizes 1st £15 and cornet valued £7.10s., 2nd £10 and trombone vauled £7.7s., 3rd £5 and baton, 4th music valued £1.1s.
Best Cornet: E. C. Wills (Camborne) Best Soprano: W. J. Uren (Camborne) Best Baritone: W. Tregellas (Camborne) Best Trombone: G. Rosevear (Camborne) Best Euphonium: J. Sanders (Redruth)
1st Annual West of England Bandsmans Contest.
5 bands competed.
Oct. 13, 2012, 9:51 p.m. May 13, 2013, 12:56 p.m.
1 Camborne Town Band William Uren
2 Redruth Town R. Wills
3 St. Dennis Band Joseph Greaves Jubb
4 Tiverton Town Joseph Greaves Jubb
4 St. Austell Town Band Joseph Greaves Jubb
